pr_title: Replaced 'unnest' function for sample tables in the docs with 'values'

timeline.bodyText:
Would you mind capitalizing ... as ... ? Also, maybe breaking this and the statements bellow into two lines will improve a readability? See https://github.com/crate/crate/pull/9603/files#diff-1a248cf3330381b363740c6a5ab9133dR367
Otherwise, LGTM
timeline.author: kovrus
